subject: Football
Discrimination
Law and Legislation
Super Bowl
Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: After voters repealed an anti-discrimination ordinance, the N.F.L. said it would stick with plans to host the 2017 Super Bowl in Houston, and the N.C.A.A. said it would keep the 2016 Final Four there.
snippet: After voters repealed an anti-discrimination ordinance, the N.F.L. said it would stick with plans to host the 2017 Super Bowl in Houston, and the N.C.A.A. said it would keep the 2016 Final Four there.
